basic.description:
In this advanced course students select one media choice from these areas: paint media, sculpture/new media or print media.
NOTE    Open only to students in a BFA Program.
LEARNING HOURS    324 (144Lb;180P)
basic.subject: ARTF
basic.title: Advanced Programs I

extra.enrollment_requirement:
NOTE  Open only to ARTF and ARTV students.
Prerequisite    A minimum grade of C- in  ARTF228 and a GPA of 1.60.
